title: Customer Support Tools Guide
author: Ekobol Support Team
image_caption: Provide exceptional customer service with integrated support tools.
intro: Deliver fast, efficient customer support with Ekobol's integrated help desk, live chat, and ticket management system. Solve issues quickly and keep customers happy.
p1: Ekobol integrates multiple customer support channels into one unified dashboard, allowing you to manage all customer inquiries from a single interface.
li1_text: Live Chat: Real-time conversations with customers on your website
li2_text: Email Support: Manage support emails as organized tickets
li3_text: Ticket System: Track and prioritize customer issues
li4_text: FAQ/Knowledge Base: Self-service articles to reduce support load
li5_text: Social Media Integration: Respond to Facebook/Instagram messages
p2: Enable live chat to provide instant support to customers browsing your store.
li6_text: Go to Settings → Support Tools → Live Chat
li8_text: Customize chat widget appearance (colors, position, welcome message)
li9_text: Set business hours for automatic availability
li11_text: Add chat widget code to your website (or use marketplace integrations)
li12_text: Canned responses: Pre-written answers for common questions
li13_text: File sharing: Send images, PDFs, or documents to customers
li14_text: Typing indicators: Customer sees when you're typing
li15_text: Chat transfer: Transfer chat to another team member
li16_text: Chat history: View past conversations with returning customers
p3: Every customer inquiry - whether from email, chat, or social media - becomes a ticket that can be tracked and managed.
li17_text: New ticket created automatically when customer contacts you
li18_text: Ticket assigned to team member (manual or auto-assignment rules)
li19_text: Team member responds, ticket status updates
li20_text: Customer replies, ticket reopens if closed
li21_text: Issue resolved, ticket marked as closed
p4: Save time by creating pre-written responses for frequently asked questions.
li23_text: Navigate to Support Tools → Canned Responses
li25_text: Set a shortcut code (e.g., '/shipping' for shipping info)
p5: Set response time goals and track team performance against them.
li34_text: Define response time targets per priority level
li36_text: Configure escalation rules (auto-escalate if SLA breached)
li37_text: Enable notifications for approaching SLA violations
li38_text: First response time: How quickly first reply is sent
li39_text: Resolution time: Time from ticket creation to closure
li40_text: SLA compliance rate: Percentage of tickets meeting SLA
li41_text: Escalation count: Tickets that violated SLA
p6: Enable your support team to work together efficiently on complex issues.
li42_text: Internal notes: Add comments visible only to team members
li43_text: Ticket assignment: Assign tickets to specific team members
li45_text: Ticket transfer: Reassign tickets between team members
li46_text: Team inbox: Shared view of all unassigned tickets
p7: Prevent two team members from responding to the same ticket simultaneously. Ekobol shows a warning if another agent is viewing/typing.
p8: Reduce support volume by empowering customers to find answers themselves.
li47_text: Identify most common support questions (use ticket analytics)
li50_text: Add screenshots and videos for visual learners
li51_text: Link knowledge base articles in canned responses
li52_text: Track article views and helpfulness ratings
p9: Track support performance and identify improvement opportunities.
li56_text: Ticket volume: Total tickets per day/week/month
li60_text: Agent performance (tickets resolved, CSAT by agent)
li61_text: Product quality: High ticket volume on specific product = quality issue
li62_text: Documentation: Repeated questions = add to knowledge base
li63_text: Process optimization: Long resolution times = improve workflow
li64_text: Staffing: Ticket surges at specific times = adjust team schedules
p11: Automate repetitive tasks to save time and ensure consistency.
li65_text: Auto-assign tickets based on keywords (shipping questions → shipping specialist)
li67_text: Auto-close tickets after 7 days of inactivity
li68_text: Auto-send satisfaction survey when ticket closed
li69_text: Auto-escalate urgent tickets if no response in 30 minutes
p12: Manage marketplace messages (Trendyol, Amazon, Etsy) directly from Ekobol support dashboard.
li70_text: All marketplace messages appear as tickets
li71_text: Respond from Ekobol, replies sync to marketplace
li73_text: No need to log into each marketplace separately
help_text: Need help setting up your support tools? Our team is here to guide you.
